p: The pullulan standards (PSS, Mainz, Germany) had molar masses ranging from 342 to 708 × 10 3 Da (PSS, Mainz, Germany) and the Mark-Houwink parameters for pullulan in aqueous solutions at 40 °C were estimated as K = 1.0176 × 10 −3 dL g −1 and a = 0.525 [ 32], whereas the d nd c was 0.149 mL g −1 [ 33].
